text: Oni sprashivayut tebya o vine i maysire. Otvechay: "I v tom, i v drugom yest' velikiy grekh, yest' i nekaya pol'za dlya lyudey, no grekha v nikh bol'she, chem pol'zy". Oni sprashivayut tebya, chto zhe im raskhodovat'. Otvechay: "Izlishek [, kotoryy ostayetsya u vas]". Tak raz"yasnyayet vam Allakh znameniya, - mozhet byt', vy porazmyslite
